sourcesContent:
import { Component } from "react";
import { Row, Col, Container, Card } from "react-bootstrap";
import Carousel from "react-multi-carousel";
import "react-multi-carousel/lib/styles.css";

class Content extends Component {
    render() {
        const responsive = {
            superLargeDesktop: {
                // the naming can be any, depends on you.
                breakpoint: { max: 4000, min: 3000 },
                items: 5
            },
            desktop: {
                breakpoint: { max: 3000, min: 1024 },
                items: 3
            },
            tablet: {
                breakpoint: { max: 1024, min: 464 },
                items: 2
            },
            mobile: {
                breakpoint: { max: 464, min: 0 },
                items: 1
            }
        };

        return (
            <Row>
                <Col className="d-none d-sm-block" sm={2} md={2} style={{ border: "1px solid green" }}>Left</Col>
                <Col sm={10} md={8} style={{ border: "1px solid green", padding: "0px" }}>
                    <Container fluid>
                        <Row>
                            <Carousel responsive={responsive}>
                                <Col xs={12} sm={6} md={3} style={{ border: "1px solid green", padding: "10px" }}>
                                    <Card>
                                        <Card.Img variant="top" src="holder.js/100px180" />
                                        <Card.Body>
                                            <Card.Text>
                                                Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the
                                                bulk of the card's content.
                                            </Card.Text>
                                        </Card.Body>
                                    </Card>
                                </Col>
                                <Col xs={12} sm={6} md={3} style={{ border: "1px solid green", padding: "10px" }}>
                                    <Card>
                                        <Card.Img variant="top" src="holder.js/100px180" />
                                        <Card.Body>
                                            <Card.Text>
                                                Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the
                                                bulk of the card's content.
                                            </Card.Text>
                                        </Card.Body>
                                    </Card>
                                </Col>
                                <Col xs={12} sm={6} md={3} style={{ border: "1px solid green", padding: "10px" }}>
                                    <Card>
                                        <Card.Img variant="top" src="holder.js/100px180" />
                                        <Card.Body>
                                            <Card.Text>
                                                Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the
                                                bulk of the card's content.
                                            </Card.Text>
                                        </Card.Body>
                                    </Card>
                                </Col>
                                <Col xs={12} sm={6} md={3} style={{ border: "1px solid green", padding: "10px" }}>
                                    <Card>
                                        <Card.Img variant="top" src="holder.js/100px180" />
                                        <Card.Body>
                                            <Card.Text>
                                                Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the
                                                bulk of the card's content.
                                            </Card.Text>
                                        </Card.Body>
                                    </Card>
                                </Col>
                            </Carousel>;
                        </Row>
                    </Container>
                </Col>
                <Col className="d-none d-sm-none d-md-block" md={2} style={{ border: "1px solid green" }}>Right</Col>
            </Row>
        );
    }
}

export default Content;
